attributes.action: The UK Government needs to push for EU border enforcement!
attributes.additional_details: The poor enforcement of EU borders has allowed tens of thousands of illegal migrants, and fraudulently claiming asylum to cross Europe.  The UK needs to lead the way in pushing the EU to support Hungary, Italy and Greece in enforcing European borders, vetting all arrivals, strictly processing and distributing genuine refugees and deporting all others including those refusing to hand over legal identification documents for processing!
attributes.background: The UK is signed up to the Schengen Agreement allowing free travel across the EU.  The poor enforcement of EU borders has allowed tens of thousands of illegal migrants, claiming asylum to cross Europe, abusing the Schengen Agreement.  This must be stopped, the borders enforced and migrants processed
